thread.title: sarah stuart

author: sarah stuart
title: sarah stuart
text: I have been using this company before I had my children but since having my children they have become more important to me than ever. I have 1 child with slim small fit so needed shoes that wont slip at the heel - difficult to find and the other child is wider than ever - needs at least 4 sizes bigger. Golden Boot so far through 13 Years and before this have accommodated my family to enable us to have the correct footwear. Thank you
